rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Hello, are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Inquire about Insurance for New Patients
rules.example: Okay, since you're new, do you happen to have dental insurance?

rules.title: Gather Dental Insurance Details
rules.condition: Patient indicates they have dental insurance.
rules.action: Ask for the insurance name and plan type (PPO or HMO).
rules.example: Great, what is the name of your dental insurance, and is it a PPO or HMO plan?

rules.title: Inform of HMO Non-Acceptance
rules.condition: Patient states their plan is HMO.
rules.action: Clearly state that the office is not contracted with HMO plans.
rules.example: I see, unfortunately, we are not contracted with HMO dental plans.

rules.title: Clarify Unknown Insurance Type
rules.condition: Patient is unsure about their PPO/HMO type.
rules.action: Re-ask the question, optionally explaining that HMO plans are not accepted.
rules.example: No problem at all. Just to confirm, is your plan a PPO or HMO? We typically don't accept HMO plans.

rules.title: Assist with Insurance Type Identification
rules.condition: Patient needs assistance identifying their insurance type.
rules.action: Offer assistance by asking about network flexibility (e.g., if they are assigned to a specific office or can choose).
rules.example: I can help with that! Are you assigned to a specific office, or can you see any dentist you choose?

rules.title: Conclude PPO from Provider Choice
rules.condition: Patient indicates they can choose any dentist they want (in response to inquiries about network flexibility).
rules.action: Conclude that the patient's insurance plan is PPO and proceed with PPO-specific actions.
rules.example: Being able to choose any dentist usually means you have a PPO plan, which we accept.

rules.title: Offer First Available Appointment for New PPO Patients
rules.condition: The patient is new and their dental insurance has been confirmed as a PPO plan.
rules.action: Proactively offer the next available appointment slot for new patients.
rules.example: Great, with your PPO plan, we can definitely get you scheduled. Our next available appointment for new patients is Tuesday, May 28th at 10:00 AM.

rules.title: Confirm Proposed Appointment Time
rules.condition: An appointment time has been offered to the patient.
rules.action: Ask the patient if the proposed appointment time works for them.
rules.example: Does Tuesday, May 28th at 10:00 AM work for you?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Responses
rules.condition: Patient provides information or asks a question.
